name: climprod1
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, cxp(c1, csn(nat1))), cli, nat1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))

comment: The limit of a product over one. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Dec-2017.)
